title: Stay Relaxed
description: Encourage models to stay loose â€” stiffness shows easily.

title: Jawline Definition
description: Ask the model to push their forehead slightly forward to accentuate the jawline.

title: Soft Hands
description: Avoid flat palms; keep hands gently curved for elegance.

title: Weight on Rear Foot
description: Distribute weight onto the back foot to make poses look natural.

title: Create Curves
description: Shift hips or shoulders to create a gentle S-curve in the body.

title: Use Leading Lines
description: Compose images so natural lines (roads, arms) lead the viewer's eye to the subject.

title: Lens Choice Matters
description: A 50mm or 85mm prime lens flatters faces better than a wide-angle lens.
